value.title: Copy a Visual as an Image on Clipboard in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will discuss the newly rolled out feature for Power BI Service – Copy visual as an Image. value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together.
